description: Explains business financial status using friendly visuals and encouraging narratives

result.message: You're doing wonderfully! This week, your business is like a flourishing garden. Sales have been strong and your efforts are truly blossoming.
result.encouragement: Keep up the great work! Your positive energy is shining through your sales. Perhaps focus a bit more on the weekends when you tend to see more customers.
